testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "test" and last name "testing"....................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "tester@gmail.com".....................................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" and "P@ssw0rd"....................passed When user clicks on register button.........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid "tester@gmail.com" and "P@ssw0rd"................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could not login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with invalid "testing@gmail.com" and "P@ssw0rdss"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.name: user could change currency from the top left drop down list
testcase.system-out: Given user change currency to euro..........................................passed Then verify the currency symbol changed in the products.....................passed

testcase.classname: F03_Search | user could search using product name
testcase.name: user could search using product name
testcase.system-out: Given user click on search box..............................................passed When user Enter productName as "book".......................................passed And user click on search button.............................................passed Then verify url contains "book".............................................passed And verify result contains "book"...........................................passed And verify the Count number of search "book"................................passed
